messages.subject: evils of progressive rock OT
messages.msgSnippet: I couldn t tell if this site was for real or a joke. I guess the guy is serious...I think he s a joke of course.:) Christian fundamentalist trying to prove
messages.messageBody:
"I couldn't tell if this site was for real or a joke."

I guess the guy is serious...I think he's a joke of course.:)
Christian fundamentalist trying to prove his point with
overgeneralizations and complete myth.

My dh got the link at one of his rock message boards. I guess he's
going to hell along with the rest of us. snark, snark.

Ren

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] evils of progressive rock OT
messages.msgSnippet: ... I couldn t tell if this site was for real or a joke.  LOL  I m going to forward it to my DH who s a King Crimson fan.  Ya know....I could never pinpoint
messages.messageBody:
On Jul 13, 2004, at 6:37 PM, Ren Allen wrote:

> No, this isn't about unschooling directly...but I got such a good
> laugh out of this, just had to share:
>
> http://www.geocities.com/evilprogressive/

I couldn't tell if this site was for real or a joke. LOL I'm going to
forward it to my DH who's a King Crimson fan. Ya know....I could never
pinpoint what was slightly "off" about my DH and now I know .... PROG
ROCK! ;) lol
-Tracy-

messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] evils of progressive rock OT
messages.msgSnippet: And my dh:-) Sherri-Lee _____ From: Ren Allen [mailto:starsuncloud@netzero.net] Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 2004 3:38 PM To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
messages.messageBody:
And my dh:-)



Sherri-Lee



_____

From: Ren Allen [mailto:starsuncloud@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 2004 3:38 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] evils of progressive rock OT



No, this isn't about unschooling directly...but I got such a good
laugh out of this, just had to share:

http://www.geocities.com/evilprogressive/

Dontcha know? Progressive rock will let darkness into your
soul...you'll become a tie dye wearing, pot smoking hippy if you
listen to it!:)

Ren
